title: Budget request
context: ยง30-6 Budget request. The governor shall include in the budget transmitted to the legislature, for each fiscal year in which the governor&rsquo;s regular term of office will expire, a request for appropriation of $100,000 for carrying out the purposes of this chapter. [L 1972, c 126, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985; am L 1988, c 9, ยง1]
